title: Version 2: Core Consignment/Accounting Improvements
constraints: Preserve all existing features: onboarding, user personalization/theming, guided workflows, identity analytics, settlement periods, adjustments, and all core entity management
Do not add authentication, Internet Identity integration, or multi-user login flows
Do not add social features (feed, connections, partnerships, follows, user profiles)
Do not add multi-tenant stores or workspace concepts
Maintain existing single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Keep all existing frontend pages and components functional
Preserve user-friendliness and captivation features (animations, layout hierarchy, visual theming)
nonGoals: Changing the core data models for Products, Reps, Consignments, Sales, Returns, Payouts, Adjustments, or Settlement Periods
